data.title: Maddam Sir 2: Mahabharat actress Pooja Sharma to play female lead; Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin star Bhavika Sharma NOT retained
data.meta_description: Mahabharat actress Pooja Sharma to make her comeback in Maddam Sir 2; to play female lead in the show.
data.text:
Mahabharat actress Pooja Sharma to make her comeback in Maddam Sir 2; to play female lead in the show.

Advertisement

Maddam Sir is one of the most popular shows that is all set to return. The comedy show kept audiences hooked to the TV screens and now its much-awaited second season will soon air. After the first successful season, there has been a high demand from fans for the new season. As per reports, there are speculations about the return of Maddam Sir season 2.

BollywoodLife is on WhatsApp. Get all the latest Entertainment News and TV News updates instantly.

Pooja Sharma to make her comeback in Maddam Sir 2

As per a report in India Forums, Pooja Sharma who is renowned for her role as Draupadi in Mahabharat show. She will reportedly play the main female lead in Maddam Sir 2.

Gulki Joshi will not return to the show and actress Bhavika Sharma who is seen in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin will also not be part of Maddam Sir 2. Yes, you read that right!

Pooja made her acting debut in 2012 with Teri Meri Love Stories. But, she gained a lot of popularity with her character as Draupadi in Mahabharata. She won millions of hearts with her role as Mahakali/Parvati in Mahakali â€” Anth Hi Aarambh Hai.

Maddam Sir was launched in February 2020 and became an instant hit. The show starred Gulki Joshi, Yukti Kapoor, Priyanshu Singh, Sonali Naik, and Bhavika Sharma in main roles. Makers of Maddam Sir will introduce new twists and turns in their second instalment and will keep audiences hooked to the screens.
